column3: ## Test Public Search Ascii Folding: Articles/Journals
Make sure there is a Journal or Article which has special ascii characters (example - I can’t really think in English ) in one of the following fields - Title - Publisher name - Country name
Go to the DOAJ search page at /search/articles for article search or /search/journals for journal search
search with ascii characters instead of special characters (example - I can't really think in English)

column4: Same search results will be displayed when searched with special characters (I can’t really think in English)
